operationId GetMonitor
parameters

in path

summary Get a monitor
responses
200
v2GetMonitorResponse
type object
v2Monitor
type object
properties
id
type string
description A monitors unique identifier
name
type string
description The name of a monitor

A monitors name
v2MonitorStatus
type string
default UNKNOWN
description The status of a monitor

 UNKNOWN Unable to determine the status of the service being monitored This is likely due to a new monitor that has not been checked yet
  UP The status of the service being monitored is up
  DOWN The status of the service being monitored is down
  SLOW The status of the service being monitored is slow A service with a slow status means the service is up but responses are taking longer than 500 milliseconds
uptimePercentage
type number
format double
description The percent of time a monitored service has had a status of UP or SLOW in the last hour
avgResponseTime
type string
description The average response time for a monitor
locations
type array

type object
properties
id
type string
description A locations unique identifier
name
type string
description A locations name
city
type string
description A locations city
cityCode
type string
description A locations city expressed as an IATA airport code
country
type string
description A locations country
countryCode
type string
description A locations ISO31661 alpha2 country code
provider
type string
description A locations network provider
ipAddresses
type string
description The IP addresses of a location

The IP addresses where monitoring checks originate from
hasIpv4
type boolean
format boolean
description Whether or not a location supports IPv4 monitoring checks
hasIpv6
type boolean
format boolean
description Whether or not a location supports IPv6 monitoring checks
description A location which performs monitoring checks
description The locations a service is monitored from
interval
type string
description The amount of time between each monitor check

By default each service monitor will be checked every five minutes
timeout
type string
description Then length of time to wait until the monitor check times out
v2IpVersion
type string
default IPV4
description The IP version of a monitor

The IP version defines which type of location a monitor can run from  Not all locations support both IP versions

  IPV4 An IPv4 monitor
  IPV6 An IPv6 monitor
v2HttpConfiguration
type object
properties
url
type string
description The URL of the service to monitor

The URL must begin with a case insensitive HTTP scheme of http or https
method
type string
description The HTTP method used when the monitor makes a request to the service
body
type string
format byte
description A base64 encoded HTTP request body to use when a monitor checks the service
headers
type array

properties

type string

type string
description An HTTP headers value
description An HTTP header
description A list of HTTP headers to add to the request when a monitor checks a service
